name: Aidan McCarthy
intro: After graduating from The University of Maryland, Global Campus in 2019 with a BS in Computer Science, I spent the next four years gaining experience at SCLogic, LLC. Before that, I interned with M&T Bank, tutored young kids with coder kids, Inc, and waited tables at Carpaccio Tuscan Kitchen in Annapolis. My life and work experience have made me adaptable, dependable, and hard-working.

work.jobSummary: I work with our customers to connect their internal and other third-party applications into our software.
achievements: I designed, deployed, and manage custom API endpoints in Azure Functions (written in C#) for an integration between our software and a locker vendor at Netflix
I work with on-prem and hosted customers to configure and deploy custom data imports from vendors such as WorkDay, PeopleSoft, and StarRez
I design, manage, and deploy projects leveraging our software for new or one-off workflows, including dock scheduling, asset and surplus management, and identity verification via Transact

work.jobSummary: I designed, managed, implemented, and supported our software for all of our hosted and on-premises customers.
achievements: Worked with new and existing customers to improve workflow effectiveness and scalability
Managed or assisted in large scale projects with high profile customers including Netflix, Amazon, LnkedIn, and Cisco
Supported internal efforts to improve and standardize workflow components, currently in use by many of our existing customers

work.jobSummary: Programming tutor for kids aged 5-18 in after school programs.
achievements: Worked with kids k-8 in explaining concepts as broad as Object Oriented Design and as minute as basic syntax and logic
Tutored classes in Machine Learning, AI, Scratch
Communicated heavily with other team members and leaders to ensure a valued experience for all aspiring programmers

work.jobSummary: I assisted M&T's IT team on various ongoing projects in data management.
achievements: Worked with Enterprise Data Services in creating efficient workflows for data heavy business needs
Worked with Enterprise Architecture to map software and database dependencies for the entire enterprise
Gained some experience programming in C#, SQL Server, Javascript, and utilizing the asp.NET framework
Volunteered with coworkers and managers to deliver Meals on Wheels

work.jobSummary: I worked as a waiter in a high end italian restaurant in downtown Annapolis, Maryland.
achievements: Sustained focus in a fast paced and high stress environment
Clear communication with guests and kitchen staff
Maintained proper time management for optimal service
